author: Annie Palmer
title: NYC Mayor Bill de Blasio orders investigation of Amazon's firing of strike organizer
description: Amazon said it fired the employee, Christian Smalls, after he "received multiple warnings for violating social distancing guidelines."
content:
New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio said Tuesday he has ordered the city's human rights commissioner to investigate Amazon's decision to fire a warehouse worker who organized a strike at its Staten Island warehouse.
